This is a testharness.js-based test.

  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test ctrlKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed before move): ctrlKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test ctrlKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): ctrlKey of pointerover should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test ctrlKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): ctrlKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
